dishes.name: Chicken Soup
dishes.label: Starter
dishes.description: Juicy chicken served with savoury chicken broth and added toppings of your choice!!

dishes.name: Cream Soup
dishes.label: Starter
dishes.description: The best cream makes the best tasting soup!! Cream Soup is worth a try!

dishes.name: Pasta Soup
dishes.label: Starter
dishes.description: Comforting and delicious pasta soup will surely tickle your taste buds!!

dishes.name: Prawn Soup
dishes.label: Starter
dishes.description: Prawns in soup makes your soup taste oceanic!!

dishes.name: Cheesy Fries
dishes.label: Appetizers
dishes.description: French fries topped with cheese, the succulent texture will surely mingle u into it.

dishes.name: Chicken Kabab
dishes.label: Appetizers
dishes.description: This glazed kebab infused with sauce is just splendid!

dishes.name: Fried Chicken
dishes.label: Appetizers
dishes.description: The smoky flavour has a very glamourous taste.

dishes.name: Chicken Nugget
dishes.label: Appetizers
dishes.description: Small piece of roasted deboned chicken in plate is just mesmerizing.

dishes.name: Biriyani
dishes.label: Main Course
dishes.description: The addition of braised biriyani with grilled chicken is hypnotising.

dishes.name: Burger
dishes.label: Main Course
dishes.description: A bite along the slice of cheese is caramelizingly wondrous.

dishes.name: Burrito
dishes.label: Main Course
dishes.description: Different parts of it pours different sense of taste with each bite.

dishes.name: Chicken Curry
dishes.label: Main Course
dishes.description: Rolling butter on top of the curry will roll your mind out.

dishes.name: Naan
dishes.label: Main Course
dishes.description: Topped with ghee it brings in an ultimate soft texture.

dishes.name: Pizza
dishes.label: Main Course
dishes.description: The pepper barbecue along with Moroccan spice will tempt you to eat another.

dishes.name: Fish Fillet
dishes.label: Main Course
dishes.description: Try out to get the enchanting taste of the fish.

dishes.name: Sandwich
dishes.label: Main Course
dishes.description: The taste of meat slice baked with cheese makes it crispy.

dishes.name: Cake
dishes.label: Dessert
dishes.description: Velvety texture with vanilla infusion will potentially add value for money.

dishes.name: Icecream
dishes.label: Dessert
dishes.description: It’s creamy texture gives the ultimate satisfaction

dishes.name: Macrons
dishes.label: Dessert
dishes.description: The mixed cream between the two toppings adds glamourous taste.

dishes.name: Donut
dishes.label: Dessert
dishes.description: The chocolaty cover on top is enthralling to one’s eye.

dishes.name: Fruit Juice
dishes.label: Drink
dishes.description: Only the best and freshest fruits are allowed inside the kitchen!

dishes.name: Mocktail
dishes.label: Drink
dishes.description: Our gateway to a fruity paradise!!

dishes.name: Beer
dishes.label: Drink
dishes.description: The perfect way to reset a bad day to a great day!!!

dishes.name: Whiskey
dishes.label: Drink
dishes.description: The highest grade whiskey with our fun filled bar games helps to connect with your inner child!!!

dishes.name: Vodka
dishes.label: Drink
dishes.description: The highest grade vodka with our fun filled bar games helps to connect with your inner child!!!

dishes.name: Tequila
dishes.label: Drink
dishes.description: The dance floor is open for some tango with Tequila!!

dishes.name: Rum
dishes.label: Drink
dishes.description: The highest grade rum with our fun filled bar games helps to connect with your inner child!!!

dishes.name: Cocktail
dishes.label: Drink
dishes.description: The skills of bartender is a spectacle to behold!!!

comments.comment: It tastes delicious!!! Will come again!!!!

comments.author: Shilpa Singh
comments.comment: Freshly made pizza, great in taste. Really loved it. Macrons were best..

comments.author: Rupesh S
comments.comment: Very nice superb!!!!!!!!!!

comments.author: Vishal
comments.comment: Pizza’s are really tasty when it’s not yours. Absolutely love it!!

comments.author: Deepak
comments.comment: Amazing and way too cheesy. way to go chill zone

comments.author: Arun Guptha
comments.comment: They forgot to add the oregano and chilli flakes sachets.

comments.author: Preksha
comments.comment: Loved the food as well as the quick service, it’s my go to place and I keep coming back to try out the new items on the menu

comments.author: D Chrissy
comments.comment: Really enjoyed the garlic naan and the lassi plus being able to eat some very tender meat after vegetarian food was a plus.

comments.author: Dr. Arjun Arya
comments.comment: Royal dish, good taste and service.

comments.author: Elon Musk
comments.comment:
This is a great food, but nothing when compared to the food on Mars.
Let’s gooooo MARS!!!!!

comments.author: Levi
comments.comment: Naan op

comments.author: Payal
comments.comment: The food was really good, fresh and tasty, the packing is very clean and good.

comments.author: BakingBot
comments.comment: Lovely and clean service, I could not stop eating the naan bread . It was the best in the wooorrrrlllllllllddddd ... I love this chill zone . It is the best

comments.author: Uday Sankar
comments.comment: AS ALWAYS GOOD... #GOOD_WORK

comments.author: Divya Chopra
comments.comment:
Delicious food.
Genuine price

comments.author: Spoorthi
comments.comment: Parotta was too good and tasty.... Fish gravy was too op

comments.author: Kevin
comments.comment: Excellent food excellent serves and take all precautions

comments.author: Amiya
comments.comment: You guys are simply awsome... All packed well and delicious food.

comments.author: Gautam S
comments.comment: The order was perfect. All food instructions were followed.

comments.author: Darshan BK
comments.comment: Taste is very Good keep it up , but quantity is bit less

comments.author: Anshu Kumar
comments.comment: Delicious but only thing is the fish is little too spicy and price is a bit on the higher side.

comments.author: Pooja Karki
comments.comment: Tried first time, impressive packing and very tasty. Both dishes and service are outstanding

comments.author: Ayush Nair
comments.comment:
The curry was tasty and juicy.
And perfect for 1 guy.

comments.author: Dhana Lakshmi
comments.comment: As always.. chill zone  never dissapoints! Best food

comments.author: Mousumi Kundu
comments.comment: I ate several times from the chill zone  because the food was so good. Never disappointed. Good service combined with good food.

comments.author: Raj Nayak
comments.comment: Properly cooked and good quantity with good packing

comments.author: Ajay Singh
comments.comment: Chicken curry was juicy and tasty.

comments.author: Jeshwanth
comments.comment:
Worth every penny. 
Fabulous!!

comments.author: Peter S
comments.comment: Grilled chicken burrito was tooooo gooood. The amount of chicken in it was just perfect.

comments.author: Smitha R
comments.comment:
Ambiance - A fine Eatery 
Quantity - One Burrito enough for one person

comments.author: Andrea
comments.comment: Great mid night meal.. just a suggestion try adding soft drinks to this bowl people will like it forever

comments.author: Batman
comments.comment:
I’m batman!!
The chicken quantity was perfect

comments.author: Praveen Kumar
comments.comment: Tikka masala burrito had very good stuffing and paneer.

comments.author: Elon Musk
comments.comment:
Burrito I love them but nothing when compared to the food on Mars.
Let’s gooooo MARS!!!!!

comments.author: Malini J
comments.comment: The food was tasty... Burgers were a bit dry but otherwise it was good

comments.author: Janaki
comments.comment: Quality of food was excellent, however the portion size could have been better!

comments.author: Olivia Ross
comments.comment: It was very delicious good to eat. Chill zone thanks to your service

comments.author: Likhith K
comments.comment: The whopper has 7 layers as advertised. Taste is really good. French fries were top notch.

comments.author: Arun
comments.comment:
the name is crispy veg patty .I like it.
It was crispy and mayonnaise is also very good in the burger

comments.author: Ava T
comments.comment: Burger and fries were too good .And packing was Gold Class and chocolate Mocktail was too good.

comments.author: Suhas
comments.comment: Good Service delivered the food on time and food was hot

comments.author: Sophia
comments.comment: Very nice packing, fast delivery and it was good.

comments.author: Dr. Arjun Arya
comments.comment: Thanks for on time delivery.. great job............

comments.author: Charlotte Grace
comments.comment:
The meat on the whopper is great quality. But they keep adding random stuff like chipotle sauce and bunch of jalapenos and it ends up overpowering everything. Keep it simple!
Overall it was fine.

comments.author: Jenny
comments.comment: Chill zone is my all time favourite. Whenever I order something, I am amazed to say that it's delivered hot and enjoy quantity to satisfy your tummy

comments.author: Anwar Pasha
comments.comment: Royal dish, good taste and service.

comments.author: Anil Kumar
comments.comment: Awesome my soul loved it thanx for your ultimate taste my soul liked it so much.

comments.author: Sneha Shetty
comments.comment: It's the first time I tried chill zone biryani and I'm absolutely spellbound by it. the biryani was delicious , there was a good amount of masala mash along with nicely chopped and diced chicken chunks. Special mention and appreciation for good quantity of salan and raitha, however I would have preferred a little more thicker and gravy like consistency rather than the liquid like which was served. Overall really satisfied.

comments.author: Aditi Sharda
comments.comment:
A very good place to eat some nice Andhra style biryani with your loved ones.
Quality is very good here.

comments.author: Mayank
comments.comment: Authentic taste of biriyani...falafel e khass is too good. packaging also very nice. It is a total package of taste, health & hygiene.

comments.author: Santhosh Kumar
comments.comment: Appreciate your service.

comments.author: Divya Chopra
comments.comment: Portion size says serves 1 but it can serve 2 people with moderate appetite.

comments.author: Madara
comments.comment:
Best keabab and Biriyani  in Bangalore but too costly 
Good taste

comments.author: Malini J
comments.comment: The quantity of the rice was good. I ordered chicken biriyani

comments.author: Adhithya
comments.comment:
Good quality of food with the right quantity.
Chilli chicken is delicious here and recommended highly

comments.author: Avantika Sarkar
comments.comment: I don't have the picture because I was busy eating it. it was so yum.it came with fries. it was so good

comments.author: Praveen Kumar
comments.comment: Perfect

comments.author: Raj Nayak
comments.comment: This joint is such a delight for food lovers.. one of the best nuggets I have had in a loooong time.. also had peri peri fries which is also quite nice ... Surely recommend it to all..

comments.author: Poornima K
comments.comment: The crunchy masala chicken nuggets was ridiculous awesome and it tasted soooo good.

comments.author: Kunal
comments.comment: That's wonderful food and quick service with great packing

comments.author: Ravi S
comments.comment: Yummy must try.. packing is too toooo gud. luved it

comments.author: Sakshi S
comments.comment: I love the food it's sooo juicy chicken and it's worth the money and luckily it's right near my home so it's a good thing whenever I have a party I always order from there.

comments.author: Noah
comments.comment:
Loved the preparation. Kebabs here are juicy and scrumptious. Highest quality of kababs had in a long time. 

Also the naan and butter garlic naan are highly recommended. 

I also liked their combos which are a combination of dal makhni and kebab.

comments.author: Swetha M
comments.comment: Loved the service, the food and goodness and kindness these people have. As we had a request in order we paid extra with a tip and the person returned my tip back . Such a great gesture and amazing food. Much much recommended

comments.author: Oliver
comments.comment:
Kebabs were juicy and the dalmakhni with it made it heavenly. 
finaly a place with decent kebabs and rolls

comments.author: Liam
comments.comment:
Really enjoyed every bite of the food. 
Food: 5/5
Quality: 5/5

comments.author: Avijit Bose
comments.comment: Really nice taste & portion size. jus perfecty made & delivered safely & on time .

comments.author: Suchita
comments.comment:
Packaging was great
Rates are very affordable

comments.author: Ravi S
comments.comment: Yummy must try.. Packing is too toooo gud. Luved it

comments.author: Mayank
comments.comment: I had called to chill zone personally and asked them to make it spicy.

comments.author: Henry
comments.comment:
very good packaging 
food is really delicious and hot and the quantity is perfect.. 
definitely gonna order again.

comments.author: Surendhar
comments.comment: Masala was good, but the chicken was bit hard. not sure it is bcs of over cooking or old stock

comments.author: Janaki
comments.comment: Great guys the food was still hot and so was awesome

comments.author: Rupesh S
comments.comment: The chicken was cooked properly with masala and it wasn't seasoned as well..

comments.author: Moorthy Simson
comments.comment: Quantity can be little bit better...

comments.author: Arun
comments.comment: The food tastes amazing and good packaging also..

comments.author: Amelia
comments.comment:
The cheese on the fries are too good.
Just  the perfect amount of cheese.

comments.author: Emma W
comments.comment: Just lov em!

comments.author: Harper White
comments.comment:
Harper White
Fine crispy fries with mayonnaise and cheese

comments.author: Henry
comments.comment: Perfect snacks

comments.author: James D
comments.comment: Really enjoyed every bite of this fries.

comments.author: Karthik R
comments.comment: It's very soft and fresh only concern is slightly costly.

comments.author: Mia K
comments.comment: Always love to order from the restaurant and juicy and fresh food best quality of packing and lots of choice to have in worth of money

comments.author: Peter S
comments.comment: Our waiter was an extremely polite and humble man. Great service and great food!!!! :)

comments.author: Arjun S
comments.comment: I really enjoyed the taste of the dishes. I had ordered the half sandwiches. The price is too high for such a small sandwich.

comments.author: Natasha
comments.comment: Sauces and vegetables were very very much perfect ,exited to order again  because of that

comments.author: M Ivy
comments.comment: it's really mouth watering. Quantity is also good as compared to their price chart.

comments.author: Sofia
comments.comment: Reliable place for a good sandwich.

comments.author: Ella
comments.comment: Very tasty food. Quantity was a little less than expected.

comments.author: B Bella
comments.comment: I ordered for toasted bread with cheese.. the quality was good and the size was okok.

comments.author: Sohail M
comments.comment: So delicious , taste is not too sweet not too plain... Awesome... Will order again

comments.author: Sayan Banerjee
comments.comment: Awesome experience. The staff personals are so humble they wrote Bengali font on behalf of my request although they don't know Bengali. I really want to thank you.

comments.author: Suchita
comments.comment: The cupcakes' taste and quality was amazing. Usually cakes and pastries are smashed under the weight of other items or so but this restaurant sent the confectionaries in a very amazing packaging and box. Every restaurant should learn from their style of sending food. Thanks.

comments.author: Spoorthi
comments.comment: Cake was fresh and taste awsm..... Thank you chill zone

comments.author: Aman Kumaar
comments.comment: I ordered red velvet jar cake. It was neatly packed & freshly made. I liked the texture and taste. They could have added some more cake instead of cream. Overall it was good. Will try other options in sometime.

comments.author: Kunal
comments.comment:
Awesome taste!! Very good packing!! Quality stuff!! Hygienic!!
MUST TRY!!❤

comments.author: Likhith K
comments.comment: Thank you soo much it was really fabulous and it made my day

comments.author: Tommy S
comments.comment: Nothing beats chill zone hands down !! Just the best ice creams treating in India.

comments.author: Chetan Kumar
comments.comment:
A wonderful place to spend gift vouchers. I had 1000 worth of them and the place was definitely the preferred location. 
The service was out of the world, very courteous and very warm. I don’t have to tell about the ice creams.

comments.author: Aparna A
comments.comment: The almond jaggery kulfi was very tasty, best kulfi ever!!!!

comments.author: Anirudh V
comments.comment: Loved their dry fruit loaded and Alphonso ice cream. great taste, Reasonable priced.

comments.author: M Ivy
comments.comment: Great packaging- cooling gel provided to make sure ice cream doesn’t melt. Kudos!

comments.author: Madara
comments.comment:
Quality and testy products,, Really love it..
Service also good 😊
I'm satisfied

comments.author: Obito
comments.comment: Great place to xhang out with your friends. Good service and all products available( the new products too). Great experience!

comments.author: Todoroki
comments.comment:
Its better late than never !
Believe it or not , i have never been to chill zone before . Finally tried it out .
Salted caramel is what i tried . It was a very nice flavour and the icecream is quite rich which is a great thing but that also means eating big scoops also is not easy so i took a small scoop.

comments.author: Penny
comments.comment: The macaroons tasted delicious and they were perfect in size, overall they were amazing

comments.author: Ella
comments.comment: Delectable collection of centre filled chocolates. Enjoyed the 70% dark chocolate assorted collection.

comments.author: Tanjiro
comments.comment: I don't know what should be the USP of this place, taste or design or worth the money or packaging. I absolutely loved everything about the cake I ordered. La Gateau you've earned a permanent customer! Nutty chocolate flavor is my favourite now 😍

comments.author: Emma W
comments.comment: Gifted to my friend and the response was ❤  So sweet of smoor.

comments.author: Poornima K
comments.comment: The quality of the chocolate was top notch. Thoroughly enjoyed.

comments.author: Naruto
comments.comment:
The cookies were delicious and not soo sweet 
They were baked very well..
I enjoyed the cookies like I never did 
I would love to visit the place again and again

comments.author: Smitha R
comments.comment:
The macrons is just amazing over here.
Just love them

comments.author: Gojo S
comments.comment: I tried Sithapal, Tender Coconut and Red Velvet Donuts. I liked Red Velvet the most.

comments.author: Noah
comments.comment: It's was like sugar syrup. Too much sweet than needed......

comments.author: Vijay Anand
comments.comment: Red Velvet donut tasted really good, I recommend it and worth trying.

comments.author: Henry
comments.comment:
It tasted yummy , I recommend this donuts
Packing is good 
Quality is good

comments.author: Kishore Kumar
comments.comment: Must try and absolute true taste. Portion is sufficient and taste is awesome. I would definitely try other flavours

comments.author: Shilpa Singh
comments.comment: I love the taste and rich texture of donuts. Affordable too

comments.author: Shruthi
comments.comment: My mom also loved the tender coconut roll ice-cream.

comments.author: Sukuna
comments.comment: The taste of the donut was very good. Please keep up the good taste in future. Looking forward to book more orders from your store. Thank you.

comments.author: Beerboii
comments.comment:
Draft beers available, starters are great! 
Ambience is good especially at evening.
Wide range of drinks and food variety for veg & non- veg.
Must visit!

comments.author: Sam J
comments.comment:
It’s a light place to visit and chill with friends. 
Inside and outside, both areas are good.
There beer collection is definitely amazing

comments.author: Tony
comments.comment: Amazing place to have a chilled beer on a Sunday afternoon loved the vibe and place.

comments.author: Noah
comments.comment: The staff are very honest and polite.

comments.author: Thor
comments.comment: Get me another one!!

comments.author: Noah
comments.comment:
Just amazing.. Just love all shots!
Don't visit with family as only teenage people will like it.. Go their have a seat, talk have fun with your buddies! A bit costly though but was good..

comments.author: Penny
comments.comment: Perfect spot for late night drinks with friends

comments.author: Rupesh S
comments.comment: Best value cocktail, was exactly what we wanted from lots of online research.

comments.author: Lee
comments.comment: Great place for liquor lovers, this store can be added in their favorite list of shops.

comments.author: Thor
comments.comment: Probably the only place of its kind in this area.. The staff is helpful and friendly and I don't really remember what I had but it was a mix of blueberry and strawberry and had a pretty purple color.. I loved it!

comments.author: Apexa
comments.comment:
Just amazing.. Just love all shots!
Don't visit with family as only teenage people will like it.. Go their have a seat, talk have fun with your buddies! A bit costly though but was good..
Apexa

comments.author: Abhishek Iyer
comments.comment:
A self service counter. Plenty of refreshing juices. Mint-lime, watermelon, orange, dates so many to choose from. 
Always great to grab a juice during the noon when Im heading back to office and away from the heat.

comments.author: Sofia
comments.comment: Has lot of options to choose from at a reasonable price with decent quantity. Would visit here from quick grab of some sandwiches, juices or shakes.

comments.author: Sarthak Oza
comments.comment: This place is great for fresh fruit juices and grilled sandwiches.

comments.author: Mayank
comments.comment: A new place...tooo good with great taste...

comments.author: Utsav Shah
comments.comment:
Utsav Shah
Nice place & good varieties of mojito & mocktails. Choco civic is quite good but green apple mint mojito is quite ok ok. It's not bad but it could be much better than this.

comments.author: Purvi Delwadiya
comments.comment: It serves some nice and refreshing mocktails which are just perfect after a long tiresome shopping session. I am a mojito lover so no doubt their mint mojito is my favourite.

comments.author: Thor
comments.comment: Ordered them by mistake.... Best mistake of my life enjoyed it a lot!!!!!!!

comments.author: Priyanka
comments.comment: I have tired it once or twice only that too long back but must say it was good experience. I like the variation in taste. Chilled, refreshing , tasty.!

comments.author: Apexa
comments.comment: Tried few mocktails here and all were good. They entertain people nicely and like to see that... the art of making mocktail is really good. Would like to try more yet....

comments.author: Shaily Naik
comments.comment: Kiwi, cranberry, lichi, mojito, strawberry, green apple... The list goes on.. I being a "Mockoholic".. Just love this outlet.. 10 on 10 for the taste and garnishing..

comments.author: Lucas
comments.comment: Smooth, perfect, goes with anything you throw at it, on the rocks, in a glass of coke heck in a 500ml bottle of coke cocktails you name it! or even sright out the bottle in harsh cold this thing surely gets us through some of the toughest times.

comments.author: William R
comments.comment:
Old Monk is famous because of it's taste and its less price tag.
And here at chill zone you have all the perfect chill setup to have fun.

comments.author: Thor
comments.comment: The taste is beautiful(actually it tastes awful when you drink it first time…I remember that I even puked when I had it first time) but, slowly you will start the liking the taste…main reason being it is very hard and it is not sweet.

comments.author: Jeshwant
comments.comment: I am a great fan of OLD MONK and believe it is the favored drink in winters!

comments.author: Abhishek K
comments.comment: Smells very good, first taste is surprising, exactly how rum should taste, however in the end, the Kung fu really hits you.

comments.author: Sam J
comments.comment: Old Monk is a rum. The bottle is very beautiful but the content is rum.

comments.author: Madara
comments.comment: Whether you’re at an A-list after party or just wanna chilling, nothing beats a Casamigos and soda for a refreshing, celeb-approved drink.

comments.author: Moorthy Simson
comments.comment: The Reposado features notes of sweet vanilla, oak, mushrooms, ginger, caramel and citrus, which gives it that perfect balance of earthiness, sweetness and spiciness with an easy finish and no lingering aftertaste.

comments.author: Amelia
comments.comment: Awesome place for late night drinks with friends

comments.author: Thor
comments.comment: Get me another one!!

comments.author: Priyanka
comments.comment: The staff are very honest and polite.

comments.author: Penny
comments.comment: Tequila is a great option for almost any occasion.

comments.author: Lucas
comments.comment: It’s a tequila created for sipping and enjoying, which makes it perfect for a good margarita. Pair your Grand Mayan with all the necessary ingredients for a top-quality cocktail.

comments.author: Joseph
comments.comment:
Love to have a cool freezing vodka to just chill with a nice view, that’s just the place chill zone is.
Keep it up guys!!

comments.author: Carter C
comments.comment: SMOOTH!!!!

comments.author: John Cena
comments.comment:
U can’t see me drinking vodka
Ohh… wait U can’t see me

comments.author: David B
comments.comment: Probably the only place of its kind in this area.. The staff is helpful and friendly…….. I loved it!

comments.author: Luke Gabriel
comments.comment: Best value money, was exactly what we was looking from lots of online research.

comments.author: Leo
comments.comment: I would give chill zone 100/10 for such a great, relaxing evening.

comments.author: Andrew
comments.comment: Good selection of fine whisky well presented with all relevant information eg taste' age' casks used and good prices. Will use again.

comments.author: Ariana G
comments.comment:
A beautiful set up.
Thank you chill zone.

comments.author: Thor
comments.comment: Get me another one!!

comments.author: Salena G
comments.comment:
Love to have a cool whiskey to just chill, that’s just the place chill zone is.
Keep it up guys!!

comments.author: Ryan Rynolds
comments.comment: The best place to buy whisky. Great range and very knowledgeable staff.

comments.author: Thomas Nicholas
comments.comment: I have been using Whisky for a while now. I like the choice (Calvados) and it is very reliable service.

comments.author: Colton
comments.comment: Excellent service, can’t be faulted.

comments.author: Miles Morales
comments.comment:
Our go to place for gin, great selection and service is always spot on.
Highly recommended guys!!

comments.author: Sanket Banerjee
comments.comment: Excellent Dish!!!!!!!

comments.author: Sidharth N
comments.comment: Amazing!!!!! Op!!!!!!!

comments.author: Shayan Paul
comments.comment: Its soooooo tasty!!!!!!11

comments.author: Karan Upma
comments.comment: I love upma with chicken!!! Best combo ever!!!!!!

comments.author: Sanket
comments.comment: Hi

leaders.name: Tony Stark
leaders.description: Our CEO, Peter, credits his hardworking parents who undertook the arduous journey to achieve greatness in America with the intention of giving their children the best future. His mother's wizardy in the kitchen whipping up the tastiest dishes with whatever is available at the supermarket, was his first inspiration to create the fusion cuisines for which The Frying Pan became well known. He brings his zeal for fusion cuisines to this restaurant, pioneering cross-cultural culinary connections.

leaders.name: Annabeth Chase
leaders.description: Our CMO, Anny, as she is affectionately referred to by her colleagues, comes from a long established family tradition in farming and produce. Her experiences growing up on a farm in the Australian outback gave her great appreciation for varieties of food sources. As she puts it in his own words, Everything that runs, wins, and everything that stays, pays!

leaders.name: John Wick
leaders.description: John is a man of focus, commitment, and sheer will. Well, John isn’t exactly ‘the public person’ but he is the one you sent to take care the public person. Once he took care of an entire media house with a pencil... With a PENCIL!!!!

leaders.name: Marco Pierre White
leaders.description: Blessed with the most discerning gustatory sense, Marco, our CFO, personally ensures that every dish that we serve meets his exacting tastes. Our chefs dread the tongue lashing that ensues if their dish does not meet his exacting standards. He lives by his motto, You click only if you survive my lick.

leaders.name: Gordon Ramsay
leaders.description: Award winning three-star Michelin chef with wide International experience having worked closely with whos-who in the culinary world, he specializes in creating mouthwatering Indo-Italian fusion experiences. He says, Put together the cuisines from the two craziest cultures, and you get a winning hit! Amma Mia!
